subject: Football
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Prisons and Prisoners
Friendship
Rap Music
Ex-Convicts
lead_paragraph: In August, Al Harris, an N.F.L. cornerback, and Kevin Soto, an ex-convict, will release a Christian rap album, the culmination of two lives that veered and converged again recently.
snippet: In August, Al Harris, an N.F.L. cornerback, and Kevin Soto, an ex-convict, will release a Christian rap album, the culmination of two lives that veered and converged again recently.
